data.DescriptionHtml: This spell has the same effects as abyssal frenzy, except as indicated above.
data.Name: Abyssal Frenzy, Mass
data.Rulebook: Fiendish Codex I: Hordes of the Abyss
data.Target: One animal, humanoid, magical beast, or monstrous humanoid/level, all of which must be within 30 ft. of each other
